conbody.p: The PCE - Settings tab is no longer used in the latest version of Conga Orchestrate. All components of PCE - Settings are now found in Conga Orchestrate Setup. Current Salesforce limitations prevent the Conga Orchestrate installed package from deleting the tab.
See Deleting the PCE - Settings Tab After Upgrading Conga Orchestrate for instructions on deleting the PCE - Settings tab.
